detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract AirToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirToken.sol#87-211) has payable functions:
	 - AirToken.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirToken.sol#199-201)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether or the call value is 0
